resources.string: A theme park for exploring volcanoes and the planet Earth. A unique place to have fun and discover the secrets of volcanism.

a Gothic cathedral and French national monument located in the town of Clermont-Ferrand in the Auvergne. It is built entirely in black lava stone, which makes it highly distinctive, and visible from a great distance.
An important and well-known place in Clermont-Ferrand. A point of passage in the city center, near the Opera House, the cathedral, markets and shopping centers.
